    <metadata>

        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>b876e656-11fa-40c5-8c4c-a282a94ff4fb#1#5</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A hideg övezet és a magashegységek élővilága</string>
            <string language="en">Living world of frigid zone and high mountains</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lebende Welt der kalten Zone und der hohen Berge</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Monde vivant de zone glaciale et de hautes 
montagnes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mundo vivo da zona frigid e de montanhas elevadas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mondo vivente della zona frigid e di alte 
montagne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κόσμος διαβίωσης της ψυχρής ζώνης και των υψηλών 
βουνών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mundo vivo de la zona frígida y de montañas 
altas</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tundrák és a sarkvidéki öv éghajlata; tundrák és sarkvidékek élővilága; függőleges övezetesség, a hegyvidékek élővilága</string>
            <string language="en">Climate of tundras and the polar zone; living world of tundras and polar regions; vertical zonality, living world of mountains</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">biom,  hideg övezet,  magashegység,  tundra,  </string>
            <string language="en">biome, frigid zone, high mountains, tundra</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Klima der Tundren und der polaren Zone; 
lebende Welt der Tundren und der polaren Regionen; 
vertikales zonality, lebende Welt der Berge</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Climat des toundras et de la zone polaire ; 
monde vivant des toundras et des régions polaires ; 
zonality vertical, monde vivant des montagnes</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Clima das tundras e da zona polar; mundo 
vivo das tundras e de regiões polares; zonality vertical, mundo
vivo das montanhas</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Clima delle tundre e della zona polare; 
mondo vivente delle tundre e delle regioni polari; 
zonality verticale, mondo vivente delle montagne</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κλίμα των tundras και της πολικής ζώνης  
κόσμος διαβίωσης των tundras και των πολικών περιοχών  
κάθετο zonality, κόσμος διαβίωσης των βουνών</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Clima de tundras y de la zona polar; mundo 
vivo de tundras y de regiones polares; zonality vertical, mundo 
vivo de montañas</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">biome, kalte Zone, hohe Berge, Tundra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biome, zone glaciale, hautes montagnes, toundra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">biome, zona frigid, montanhas elevadas, tundra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">biome, zona frigid, alte montagne, tundra</string>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">biome, zona frígida, montañas altas, tundra</string>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
